subject: Assaults
Football
Domestic Violence
Sentences (Criminal)
lead_paragraph: The former San Francisco 49er Kwame Harris has been sentenced to five days in jail and three years of probation for assaulting a boyfriend outside a California restaurant last year.
snippet: The former San Francisco 49er Kwame Harris has been sentenced to five days in jail and three years of probation for assaulting a boyfriend outside a California restaurant last year.
